Articles.Content: How to safely and correctly install mods?

Step #1: Ask in the modding subforum.

(Thread moved.)

Most mods come in one of two forms.

#1 They have a folder in their zip called GameData. Take this folder and drop it directly into the Kerbal Space Program folder, choose to overwrite if prompted.

(For Steam, the folder is typically C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program)

#2 They don't have a folder in their zip called GameData. Take the files and folders in the zip and drop them into the GameData folder in the Kerbal Space Program folder.

There are a few mods which are more complicated and require instructions, they provide those, but mods are always loaded from GameData.
